name: div
features: Elastic Compression Strap: Secures and supports wrist; adjustable for quick on & off
Coverage Dimensions: 11.5”H x 5”W – designed to fit either hand comfortably
Use On Either Hand: Universal design compatible with both left & right-hand use
Rubber Finger Bumper: Reinforces top of fingers to protect on-base contact
Channels Along Palm and Backhand: Separate protective shields enhance dexterity for base hooking
Thumb Hole Cover: Interior cloth material adds comfort when thumb is inside the mitt
Protective Plates: Shield both top & underside of hand during slides
Wrist Stabilization Strip: Reinforced on both sides for a secure, stable wrist fit
